name: Just another Game
description:
HI!

This is just another escape game 3D game with "high quality" drawings. 

You have to get to the shop because you work there so you have to escape from your house. 

Controls:

  • walk: a w s d
  • jump: space
  • interact: e
  • drop item: q
  • crouch: left shift

Music from https://www.bensound.com/

Help (if you got stuck somewhere):

  1. The missing ladder part is in a box
  2. The door can burn
  3. You can get money by putting metal rods in that blue box
  4. There is a secret level
